/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.user.repository.UserMapper.selectListUser */ select cu.dept_cd --부서코드 , cu.email --이메일 , cu.gen_cd --성별(M,F) , cu.profile_img_path --프로필이미지경로 , cu.job_cd --직급코드 , cu.msg_rcv_yn --메세지수신여부 , cu.pos_cd , cu.user_id --직원아이디 , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then cu.user_nm_kg else cu.user_nm_ru end) as user_nm , cu.user_nm_kg --이름(키르키즈어) , cu.user_nm_ru --이름(러시아어) , cu.dept_head_yn --부서장여부 , cu.doc_mgr_yn --문서관리자여부 , cu.reg_id , cu.reg_dt , cu.mod_id , cu.mod_dt , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then cd.dept_nm1 else cd.dept_nm2 end) as dept_nm , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then cc.code_nm1 else cc.code_nm2 end) as job_nm from com_user cu left join com_dept cd on cd.dept_cd = cu.dept_cd left join com_code_detail cc on cc.code_id = cu.job_cd where 1=1
and cu.user_nm_kg like concat('%', #{userNm}, '%')
and cu.user_nm_ru like concat('%', #{userNm}, '%')
order by reg_dt desc

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.user.repository.UserMapper.selectListUserByDept */ select view.user_id , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then view.user_nm_kg else view.user_nm_ru end) as user_nm , view.dept_cd , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then view.dept_nm_kg else view.dept_nm_ru end) as dept_nm , view.email , view.gen_cd , view.job_cd , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then cc.code_nm1 else cc.code_nm1 end) job_nm , view.pos_cd , view.age_cd , view.cmit_cd , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then view.cmit_nm_kg else view.cmit_nm_ru end) as cmit_nm , view.poly_cd , view.poly_nm from kgst.view_user_member view left join com_code_detail cc on cc.code_id = view.job_cd where 1=1
AND (view.dept_cd = #{deptCd} OR view.poly_cd = #{deptCd} OR view.cmit_cd = #{deptCd})

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.user.repository.UserMapper.selectUser */ select cu.seq , cu.dept_cd --부서코드 , cu.email --이메일 , cu.gen_cd --성별(M,F) , cu.profile_img_path --프로필이미지경로 , cu.job_Cd --직급코드 , cu.msg_rcv_yn --메세지수신여부 , cu.pos_cd , cu.user_id --직원아이디 , cu.user_nm_kg --이름(키르키즈어) , cu.user_nm_ru --이름(러시아어) , cu.dept_head_yn --부서장여부 , cu.doc_mgr_yn --문서관리자여부 , cu.reg_id , cu.reg_dt , cu.mod_id , cu.mod_dt , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then cd.dept_nm1 when #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then cd.dept_nm2 else cd.dept_nm3 end) as dept_nm from com_user cu inner join com_dept cd on cd.dept_cd = cu.dept_cd where seq = #{seq}
